displayName.text: The Cecilia Chorus of New York

formattedAddress: 150 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: The Cecilia Chorus of New York

adrFormatAddress: 150 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: I absolutely love being a part of this chorus.  The high quality of the musicianship, the collegial nature of the group, and the innovative programming and collaborations that our musical director always comes up with all really set Cecilia apart for me. Singing at Carnegie Hall twice a year never gets old, and providing an avenue for rising stars in the opera world to make their Carnegie debut as soloists with us makes each and every performance amazing. A great group of people to make music with!

A great group of people to make music with!

originalText.text: Cecilia has been a great place to sing new and classic pieces!  I can't begin to tell you how fun it is to sing in Carnegie Hall and be able to invite all your friends to see you on that stage!!  Be ready to learn and expand your musicality and also meet a ton of great people!

text.text: Cecilia has been a great place to sing new and classic pieces!  I can't begin to tell you how fun it is to sing in Carnegie Hall and be able to invite all your friends to see you on that stage!!  Be ready to learn and expand your musicality and also meet a ton of great people!

originalText.text: This chorus community has been invaluable to me following my cross country move to NYC. I feel privileged to sing alongside such kind and talented musicians under the direction of a master of his craft, Mark Shapiro. Looking forward to singing incredible music, new and old, in the seasons ahead!

originalText.text: Friendly and welcoming group! It’s been quite a thrill to perform at Carnegie Hall twice a year with them.

originalText.text: Fantastic group with an amazing musical director. Their Carnegie Hall concerts are incredible.
